title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Minor Update 155976
description: Welcome to a small update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! This is the second of two small patches originally planned to address issues reported in the most recent update. Today’s patch addresses gameplay issues and bugs reported by the community. Please check out our Known Issues page to see a list of these … Continued

title: The Yokai of Heavenly Spear – Part Two
description: In Japanese myth, yokai are supernatural beings of dubious nature that could be variously called demons, monsters, or spirits, and in Age of Mythology: Retold – Heavenly Spear, we sought to bring that world to life. Part I of the previous installment explored myth units of the Archaic and Classical Ages, as well as the … Continued

title: The Crucible – Defend Your Wonder in Age of Empires IV: Dynasties of the East
description: With the upcoming release of the Dynasties of the East expansion on November 4th, Age of Empires IV will introduce an all-new singleplayer roguelite RTS experience built from the ground up for replayability: The Crucible. Players will face unpredictable enemy waves, randomized objectives, and unlockable upgrades – no two matches are the same, and each decision shapes the path forward. Whether you’re defending your Wonder, unlocking … Continued

title: The Yokai of Heavenly Spear – Part One
description: In Age of Mythology: Retold – Heavenly Spear, we wanted to bring the exciting world of Japanese mythology to life. In Japanese myth, yokai are supernatural beings of dubious nature that could be variously called demons, monsters, or spirits—although none of these terms fully capture the variety and uniqueness of these creatures. For the Heavenly … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Minor Update 153638
description: Welcome to a small update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! This is the first of two small patches planned in the near future to address issues reported in the most recent update. Today’s patch addresses key stability issues on console. Our teams are already working on a second patch to address gameplay issues … Continued
